overview: Ever since they both turned 18, Kristen Scott has been getting mixed signals. She's finally going to make a move on her cute best friend Ivy Wolfe. Tiffany Watson can't believe she got ditched, but her stepsister Nina North is doing her best to console her. When she asked who her date was, she realized that Tiffany is into girls, just like her. April O'Neil has her suspicions on her wife Angela White. When she gets back home, she tells her that she went out and the girls hired some strippers. By the time Angela is done recounting her night of passion, April is so turned on that she doesn't care about her wife's minor indiscretions.
title: Mixed Messages
